function_v0.doc: Initializes the contract storage by setting the token contract address\nand initializing the deposit counter to zero.
function_v0.name: init

function_v0.doc: Deposits tokens into escrow.\nThis transfers tokens from the sender\xe2\x80\x99s account to the escrow contract\xe2\x80\x99s account,\nand records the deposit amount using a deposit counter.
function_v0.name: deposit

function_v0.doc: Sends tokens from the escrow contract\xe2\x80\x99s account to a specified recipient.\nThis transfers tokens from the escrow account (i.e. the contract's own address)\nto the recipient\xe2\x80\x99s address.
function_v0.name: send
